column1: #Row 2 ORGANISATION_CODE: Enter an organisation code that matches the current organisation.
#Row 3 ORGANISATION_CODE: Enter an organisation code
#Row 4 SCHOOL_URN: The school URN is not recognised. If you’ve checked the URN
#Row 5 SCHOOL_NAME: Enter a school name.
Row 5 SCHOOL_NAME or School is required
Row 6 NHS_NUMBER: should be a valid NHS number with 10 characters
Row 7 NHS_NUMBER: should be a valid NHS number with 10 characters
#Row 8 PERSON_FORENAME: Enter a first name.
Row 8 PERSON_FORENAME or First name is required
#Row 9 PERSON_SURNAME: Enter a last name.
Row 9 PERSON_SURNAME or Surname is required
#Row 10 PERSON_DOB: Enter a date of birth in the correct format.
Row 10 PERSON_DOB or Date of birth is required
Row 11 PERSON_DOB: Enter a date of birth in the correct format.
Row 12 DATE_OF_VACCINATION: The vaccination date is before the date of birth. PERSON_DOB: Enter a date of birth in the past.
Row 13 PERSON_DOB: Enter a date of birth in the correct format.
#Row 14 PERSON_GENDER_CODE/PERSON_GENDER: Enter a gender or gender code.
Row 14 PERSON_GENDER_CODE
#Row 15 PERSON_GENDER_CODE/PERSON_GENDER: Enter a gender or gender code.
Row 15 PERSON_GENDER_CODE: Enter a valid gender or gender code.
#Row 16 PERSON_POSTCODE: Enter a valid postcode
Row 16 PERSON_POSTCODE or Postcode is required
Row 17 PERSON_POSTCODE: Enter a valid postcode
#Row 18 DATE_OF_VACCINATION: Enter a date in the correct format
Row 18 DATE_OF_VACCINATION or Event date is required
Row 19 DATE_OF_VACCINATION: The vaccination date is in the future.
#Row 20 VACCINE_GIVEN: Enter a valid vaccine
Row 21 VACCINE_GIVEN: This vaccine is not available in this session.
#Row 22 BATCH_NUMBER: Enter a batch number.
#Row 23 BATCH_EXPIRY_DATE: Enter a batch expiry date.
#Row 24 ANATOMICAL_SITE: Enter an anatomical site.
#Row 28 DOSE_SEQUENCE: The dose sequence number cannot be greater than 3. Enter a dose sequence number
Row 29 DOSE_SEQUENCE: must be less than or equal to 3
#Row 30 CARE_SETTING: Enter a care setting.
Row 33 PERFORMING_PROFESSIONAL_EMAIL: Enter a valid email address
Row 35 TIME_OF_VACCINATION: Enter a time in the correct format.
Row 36 REASON_NOT_VACCINATED: must be blank

#Row 37 VACCINATED: You need to record whether the child was vaccinated or not. Enter ‘Y’ or ‘N’ in the ‘vaccinated’ column.BATCH_EXPIRY_DATE: must be blankBATCH_NUMBER: must be blankANATOMICAL_SITE: must be blankREASON_NOT_VACCINATED: Enter a valid reason

Row 37 VACCINATED: You need to record whether the child was vaccinated or not. Enter ‘Y’ or ‘N’ in the ‘vaccinated’ column.BATCH_EXPIRY_DATE: must be blankBATCH_NUMBER: must be blankANATOMICAL_SITE: must be blankREASON_NOT_VACCINATED: Enter a valid reason
Row 38 CARE_SETTING: Enter a valid care setting.
